I ordered a size larger than what I usually wear since in my experience with many online retailers the sizing seems to run small, so the fit is great.  Looks good.  Wish the material was just a bit thicker, but overall satisfied with my purchase
I bought the blue and it looks great with jeans.  I like that it’s soft and warm but not a heavy bulky sweater.  Fits great, doesn’t cling to you.
This sweater is soft, good length and very comfortable.  It was received in time and packaged nicely.  The color wasn’t exactly what I wanted but it is ok.
Super cute and comfy. Washes great.

I ordered a 2xl because I like my tops a bit loose. But this was too small for me and my daughter who is a size smaller than me. If you like a more fitted shirt rather than a more loose sweater like how it fits the model then order your normal size. If you like more of a loose fit order up at least a size. It also is not as long as it appears. The fabric is nice and soft. A nice lightweight sweater.

Fits well but pretty lightweight

It’s thin material.  All the reviewers talk about how cozy it is, I don’t really consider material this thin as “cozy”.  It is soft. It is form fitting, and does not run large.Didn’t work for me, so it’s going back.

评论概述: Mice fabric but fits really small.
评论详情: I like the fabric and style but will have to return the two of these I bought.  I ordered my normal size (which is usually loose on me) and they are TIGHT.  I would order at least 2 sizes up.

I'm thrilled with this purchase. It's hard to tell in a picture online what the fabric might actually be like, so I'm beyond happy with how soft the fabric is. It's on the lighter-weight side, meaning it's not going to keep me warm if it's cold outside, but it's not see-through either. It fits beautifully. I love it. My only dilemma is what color to buy next.

I originally ordered the gray, but didn't like the color so ordered this blue. It washed well, and you do have to hang to dry. It's a lightweight sweater, but not see through. It really helps me when people leave photo reviews along with their sizes, so here goes: I'm 5' 7" and about 203 lbs. I wear a 38DD and have large upper arms. This sweater is an XL. Hope this helps you to see the length and fit on someone my size. :)
This is a great V-neck fall long sleeve top! It will be in the rotation for work wear AND lounge wear! Washes well on COLD. Lay flat to dry almost, then pop it in the dryer for 10 minutes!

I love the color and softness. It is great to wear in milder weather. The material thickness is light to medium. This is so soft and it has become my favorite shirt to wear. The fit and quality are great.

Nice fit and light weight

Wore this in a family photo shoot and absolutely love it. I run warm so this will be perfect for the winter when I need something that won’t burn me up but keep me warm at the same time. Very flattering too!
